alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 9:09AM CDT until May 08 at 3:20AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Spring River near Quapaw affecting Ottawa County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Spring River near Quapaw. * WHEN...From this morning to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, recreational areas near the gage site are inundated to a depth of several feet. The gage site may be cut off from easy access. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 22.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 28.0 feet late tonight. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
